author: nikclayton
msg: Adjust revprop_list() with named and optional parameter support.
* Client.pm: Remove revprop_list from the list of general functions and
add it to the list of the functions that take named params.  Provide
a Params::Validate parameter specification.  Adjust the revprop_list
Adjust the revprop_get documentation, and remove the positional
* t/3client.t: Add tests that verify that revprop_list works with named
params, and that optional parameters are filled out correctly.

author: cmpilato
msg: Mention Clearvision on the Commercial Support page.

author: lundblad
msg: On the merge-tracking branch: Small docstring tweaks.
(svn_fs_merge_info__get_merge_info): Rewrite docstring in the hope of making
it clearer and correct POOL usage documentation.
and add sentence about pool usage.

author: kfogel
msg: Correctly determine when to finish reading an entry.
(read_entry): Check MAYBE_DONE not only after reading keep-local,
but also after the new depth block, so that the [harmless]
MAYBE_DONE marker will be there for the next person who has to add
